entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
